hotels.title: Sky-High Sofitel Luxury in Guiyang CBD with Three Restaurants & Bars, Indoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Discover an unparalleled retreat at a five-star sanctuary nestled in the dynamic heart of Guiyang. Just moments from the iconic Jiaxiu Pavilion and the scenic Nanming district, this exquisite hotel unites cultural heritage with sophisticated bliss. Unwind in elegantly appointed rooms offering sweeping views of the glittering city skyline. Indulge in ultimate relaxation at the luxurious Sofitel SPA or take a refreshing dip in the indoor heated pool. Tuck into the bold flavours of Sichuan and authentic Guizhou cuisine at LE CHINOIS, or elevate your evening with a handcrafted cocktail at LE BAR, perched on the 55th floor with breathtaking panoramic vistas.

hotels.title: Modern Guiyang City Escape near Airport with Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Guiyang from a prime location in the city's bustling commercial district. This stylish retreat places you within easy reach of the city's most popular attractions, including the ancient Nanming District, picturesque Huaxi National City Wetland Park and historic Jiaxiu Tower. Surrounded by a plethora of local eateries, shops and cultural landmarks, Novotel Guiyang Downtown is near Guiyang Railway Station, making it the perfect base for your urban exploration. After a day of sightseeing, retreat to the hotel to enjoy a refreshing drink at one of the refined onsite lounges, or keep active in the modern fitness centre.
